ch.nolix.element.core

Class ValueOrPercentageHolder

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.nolix.core.entity.Entity
      • ch.nolix.element.core.Element
        • ch.nolix.element.core.ValueOrPercentageHolder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Typed, TypeRequestable, Specified

    public final class ValueOrPercentageHolder
extends Element
    A ValueOrPercentageHolder stores either a value or a percentage. A ValueOrPercentageHolder is not mutable. For higher performance, a ValueOrPercentageHolder accesses its private attributes directly and not through the available methods.
    Author:
    Silvan Wyss
